data.title: Consuelo Castillo Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: Consuelo V. Castillo passed away at her home at the age of 84. She was proceeded in death by her husband Dario A. Castillo Jr., her parents Frank M. Valdez and  Filomena R. Vald...
data.text: Consuelo V. Castillo passed away at her home at the age of 84. She was proceeded in death by her husband Dario A. Castillo Jr., her parents Frank M. Valdez and Filomena R. Valdez, brothers Edward Valdez, Richard Valdez, Roland Valdez, sisters Aurora Fernandez, Francis Guzman, In laws Dario Castillo Sr. and Eusebia Castillo. She is survived by sons; Ronald D. Castillo Sr. and Frank A. Castillo Sr., brother Raul Valdez, grandchildren Ronald D. Castillo Jr., (Leslie) Christopher Castillo, Nicholas Castillo, Misty, Ashley, Frank Jr., Alexandria, Fabian, Victoria, Mercadie, and Miracle, as well as 11 Great Grandchildren, 43 nieces and nephews and their spouses. Our Mother attended Lanier High School, she left school to help support her mother. She was a sales associate at Grants, Sarco, also worked with SAISD and retired as a sales associate at Dillards. Visitation and Rosary willbe held Wednesday,February 3, 2021 from 10:00AM to 12:00PM at Puente and Sons Funeral Home, 3520 S. Flores. Funeral Mass will follow at St. Mary Magdalen Church 1710 Clower. Graveside and Final resting place February 3, 2021 at El Carmen Cemetery 18555 Leal Rd @Losaya Rd.
